text: Securing a new AWS account: MFA B Step 2: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA). * Require MFA for your account root user and for all IAM users. * You can also use MFA to control access to AWS service APIs. + Options for retrieving the MFA token — « Virtual MFA-compliant applications: * Google Authenticator. * Authy Authenticator (Windows phone app). » U2F security key devices: * For example, YubiKey. MEZ LoKen * Hardware MFA options: * Key fob or display card offered by Gemalto.
